scenes.background: Bob and Monica look at each other, unsure.
scenes.description: I still think we could have managed. Was it really necessary for you to step in?

options.text: It seemed like you were struggling, so I thought it best to assist.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the struggle and justify your assistance, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but could improve on perception and empathy.

options.text: Maybe next time, we can better assess the situation before making a decision.
options.analysis: You suggest a more cautious approach for the future, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: If you think so, Bob. But I believe extra help can sometimes be critical.
options.analysis: You express disagreement but show understanding, demonstrating empathy but lower in perception and motivation.
